message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to showcase this product. It's truly one-of-a-kind and I believe it will be highly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it at $1,300,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $900,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value to your operations.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the product's unique features and my financial constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for it. Let's see if we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
